ai-patthana19.5:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.5:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the corruption of defiled thought. Avoiding corruption gives rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana19.5:1.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to the corruption of defiled thought. Avoiding corruption gives rise to the defilements. Corruptions cause or condition.
ai-patthana19.5:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the corruption of defiled thought. All these gives rise to corruptions.
ai-patthana19.5:3.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to the corruption of thought. Avoiding corruption gives rise to the defilements. Corruptions give rise to the thought that causes causes and conditions.
ai-patthana19.5:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
